name: Skin Glow Body Scrub
description:
A deliciously gourmet, delightfully fragrant body scrub, that will leave your skin exfoliated, moisturized, and glowing! Apply to dry or wet skin, in shower or bath. Take a small amount into palm and gently massage onto skin in circular motion. When you're all scrubbed, rinse thoroughly with warm water and pat dry.

Ingredients: Fine sea salt, epsom salt, aloe butter, sweet almond oil, Himalayan salt, blueberry seeds, powdered organic roses, citric acid, vegetable glycerin, and rose geranium and lily/ylang ylang essential oils.

2 ounces in a glass jar.

name: Botanical Perfumes, Sample Pack
description: A sample pack of all five of my Botanical Perfumes: Dreamscape, Avalon, Ancient Forest, Delphi, and Nostalgia in a pretty organza bag with bead. Each sample is approximately 1 ml in a glass vial. See listings for each individual perfume for descriptions and ingredients. And a flyer will be included with this info as well.

name: Eye Serum
description:
Gaia's Garden Herbals Eye Serum is a nourishing and luxurious serum created for delicate under eye skin. Many customers have asked me for an eye cream and this is what I was inspired to make. The oils in this serum absorb quickly and leave the skin so smooth and soft you'll be amazed! To use just put a drop on your fingertip (use the middle finger for the least pressure on this delicate area) and gently pat into skin. The wand in the bottle makes this easy! . 5 ounce, in a blue cobalt bottle with wand.

Ingredients: Meadowfoam seed oil, jojoba oil, evening primrose oil, grapeseed oil, Vitamin E, rose otto, and carrot seed, palmarosa, and sea buckthorn essential oils.

name: Moisturizing Skin Cream
description:
Moisturizing Skin Cream is Gaia's Garden Herbals best-selling product. The formula has been perfected over the course of several years with the input of family and friends. A wonderfully nourishing skin cream, it is ideal for dry and normal skin. Repeat customers love it for its ability to minimize fine lines, heal rashes and irritations, and improve skin tone and color. Made with fresh, organic calendula flowers grown in Susan's garden, sun-infused in extra virgin olive oil. Comes in a 2 ounce glass jar.

Ingredients: Fresh, organic Calendula flowers sun-infused in extra virgin olive oil, grapeseed oil, sweet almond oil, organic coconut oil, apricot kernel oil, kukui nut oil, organic aloe vera, organic rose hydrosol (with Vit. C), distilled water, beeswax, Vit. E, citric acid (Vit. C), propolis, and lavender, jasmine, carrot seed, geranium, cape chamomile essential oils, rose absolute.

name: Ancient Forest Botanical Perfume
description:
Gaia's Garden Herbals Botanical Perfumes are created in the traditional way - the top, heart, and base accords are blended and aged separately to soften and meld the pure essential oils, absolutes, and resins before the final perfume is created. Once the accords are in the bottle, it's topped off with organic fractionated coconut oil. Because the perfumes are made with all natural ingredients, the fragrance will continue to evolve and deepen over time.

"Ancient Forest" (for men too!) is redolent of a walk through a pine, spruce, and fir wood with a hint of smoky campfire in the distance. The heart is a slightly sweet coniferous accord of fir balsam, doug fir, spruce, siberian fir, and wild myrrh, that shines through the top of bergamot, green mandarin, fir balsam, tonka, juniper berry, and wormwood. The smoke and depth comes in the base of oakmoss, labdanum, patchouli, rosemary verbenone, lime, and cade. Perfect for ritual too!

As with all botanical perfumes, Ancient Forest will blend with your body chemistry to be uniquely yours. Medium tenacity.

8.5 ml in a glass bottle.

name: Avalon Botanical Perfume
description:
Gaia's Garden Herbals Botanical Perfumes are created in the traditional way - the top, heart, and base accords are blended and aged separately to soften and meld the pure essential oils, absolutes, and resins before the final perfume is created. Once the accords are in the bottle, it's topped off with organic fractionated coconut oil. Because the perfumes are made with all natural ingredients, the fragrance will continue to evolve and deepen over time.

"Avalon" is a tribute to both the modern-day Glastonbury, England, as well as its historical and (so-called) mythical past. It is a deep, feminine fragrance with a heart of ylang/lily (an unusual codistillation that is amazing), violet leaf, rose de mai, tulsi, and black pepper, that sings through the top of bergamot, rosemary, red mandarin, cistus, galbanum, wormwood, frankincense, and sandalwood. It's all grounded by a base of amber, patchouli, vetiver, bergamot, and myrrh.

Younger women seem to gravitate to this fragrance, perhaps because it's so sweetly floral. As far as tenacity goes, I rate this medium to long lasting, with a heart that remains present throughout.

As with all botanical perfumes, Avalon will blend with your body chemistry to be uniquely yours.

8.5 ml in a glass bottle.

name: Dreamscape Botanical Perfume
description:
Gaia's Garden Herbals Botanical Perfumes are created in the traditional way - the top, heart, and base accords are blended and aged separately to soften and meld the pure essential oils, absolutes, and resins before the final perfume is created. Once the accords are in the bottle, it's topped off with organic fractionated coconut oil. Because the perfumes are made with all natural ingredients, the fragrance will continue to evolve and deepen over time.

"Dreamscape" is deep, heady, even a bit narcotic. It was inspired by a dream (hence the name) and came to me as if by magic. The top of bergamot, bois de rose, frankincense, and lavender enhances the floral, slightly spicy heart of sandalwood, rose otto, ylang, clary sage, tonka, and tulsi. But it's the base of oakmoss, labdanum, patchouli, myrrh, amyris, angelic root, and galbanum that deepens the whole and makes it truly special.

Whenever I wear this fragrance, which is often because I'm addicted to it, people come up to me and want to know the name of my perfume. Even in the local feed store where I was purchasing bird seed! Botanical perfumes, unlike chemical fragrances most people are familiar with, blend with the wearer's body chemistry. The tenacity of this perfume is medium. I notice now that fall is here and it's a bit cooler and less humid, the perfume lasts longer on the skin. And rest assured, though you will smell awesome, you wear the scent, it doesn't wear you. Unless, of course, you douse yourself with it because you love it so much.

8.5 ml in a glass bottle.

name: Nostalgia Botanical Perfume
description:
Gaia's Garden Herbals Botanical Perfumes are created in the traditional way - the top, heart, and base accords are blended and aged separately to soften and meld the pure essential oils, absolutes, and resins before the final perfume is created. Once the accords are in the bottle, it's topped off with organic fractionated coconut oil. Because the perfumes are made with all natural ingredients, the fragrance will continue to evolve and deepen over time.

"Nostalgia" is a basic floral chypre style perfume. It's a light, luscious floral with a heart of jasmine, rose, ylang, and lavender balanced perfectly with a base of oakmoss, bergamot, vetiver, and patchouli, and a zingy citrus top of orange, lemon, mandarin, nutmeg, and clove. I call it "Nostalgia" because it reminds me of a perfume my mother wore in the 1950s. That's my mother in the picture.

As with all botanical perfumes, Nostalgia will blend with your body chemistry to be uniquely yours. Light to medium tenacity.

8.5 ml in a glass bottle.

name: Delphi Botanical Perfume
description:
Gaia's Garden Herbals Botanical Perfumes are created in the traditional way - the top, heart, and base accords are blended and aged separately to soften and meld the pure essential oils, absolutes, and resins before the final perfume is created. Once the accords are in the bottle, it's topped off with organic fractionated coconut oil. Because the perfumes are made with all natural ingredients, the fragrance will continue to evolve and deepen over time.

"Delphi" was inspired by my visit to the Oracle at Delphi in Greece. The day was warm and sunny, the air dry and redolent of herbs and cypress, and heat on ancient ruins. It took a few trys to translate my experience of Delphi into fragrance. The result is a very special, sunny yellow perfume that has many fans. The spicy, slightly woody top of cassia, cardamom, fennel, coriander, clove, lime, juniper, and cedarwood, yields to a sweet/spicy heart of rose absolute, gingerlily, rose geranium, cinnamon leaf, and tulsi. A base of orris root, oakmoss, frankincense, palo santo, angelica root, and labdanum balances the sweet and spicy and adds richness and depth.

As with all botanical perfumes, Delphi will blend with your body chemistry to be uniquely yours. Medium tenacity.

8.5 ml in a glass bottle.

name: Love Your Hands Salve
description:
As a gardener, and a homeowner who heats with wood, my hands can become dry, chapped, and cracked. I created this salve origionally for myself and to give as gifts with cotton bed gloves for Christmas. Everyone loved it so much I decided to sell it too! I kid you not - this salve soothes, heals, and softens the roughest skin if used regularly. I recommend you use it each night before bed (or anytime really except that it's a bit oily until it absorbs). For best results use cotton bed gloves.

Ingredients: Organic calendula flowers, comfrey leaf and root, and plantain infused (separately) in extra virgin olive oil, sweet almond oil, coconut oil, castor oil, avocado oil, evening primrose oil, beeswax, Vit. E, and lavender, calendula, wild niaouli, palmarosa, copaiba balsam, Roman chamomile, wild chamomile, helichrysum, clary sage, and sea buckthorn essential oils.

2 ounces in a glass jar

name: Calendula Body Butter
description:
Made with organically grown calendula flowers from Susan's garden infused in extra virgin olive oil. This wonderfully moisturizing and soothing body butter is awesome at any time but especially great for after bathing or spending time in the sun. Nourishes healthy skin, heals dry, irritated skin, and soothes rashes. Excellent for all-over body massage (I make a version of this butter for my massage therapist!). Gentle enough for babies.

Ingredients: Organic calendula flowers infused in extra virgin olive oil, castor oil, distilled water, beeswax, propolis, and calendula, bergamot, petitgrain, and geranium essential oils.

2 ounces in a glass jar

name: Skin Renew Balm
description:
A deep healing, super-nourishing, and protective balm formulated specifically for skin in need of extra care. If you seek relief from rashes and irritations such as eczema and psoriasis, burns and skin suffering the effects of chemotherapy and radiation treatments, give this cream a try. Made with oils high in essential fatty acids, anti-oxidents, and vitamins. In addition, red raspberry seed oil has UV-A and UV-B blocking properties. Aloe vera, glycerin, and helichrysum hydrosol are known healers/moisturizers, and the essential oils add healing and anti-inflammatory qualities. You won't find a higher quality skin balm than this at any price!

Ingredients: Apricot kernel oil, camelina oil, kukui nut oil, meadowfoam seed oil, rosehip seed oil, pomegranite seed oil, red raspberry seed oil, ogranic helichrysum hydrosol, organic aloe vera, glycerin, beeswax, and helichrysum, bergamot, lavender, sea bucktorn, geranium, Roman chamomile, and clary sage essential oils.

1 ounce in a glass jar.

name: Rose Skin Cream
description:
This is one of my most popular creams. Many repeat customers who rave about how it softens skin, minimizes fine lines and red spider veins, and even helps diminish under-eye circles. It's luxuriously scented, deeply moisturizing, and tinted pink with alkanet root which is a natural sunscreen. Suitable for all skin types, especially wonderful for dry, irritated skin, and mature skin.
Rose oil has long been revered for its healing qualities and heavenly scent. Rose otto, the most precious of the rose oils, is highly therapeutic; rose absolute the most fragrant. This cream contains both.

Ingredients: Organic roses infused in extra virgin olive oil, grapeseed oil, apricot oil, organic rosehip seed oil, organic rose hydrosol (with Vit. C), aloe vera, distilled water, beeswax, Vit. E, alkanet root, propolis, rose absolute, rose otto, and carrot seed essential oil.

2 ounces in a glass jar.

name: Lynx Balm
description:
This all-natural analgesic balm was formulated to relieve sore muscles, aches, and pains. The menthol and camphor crystals offer penetrating, cooling pain relief. Excellent as a decongestant rub for chest or under the nose (to relieve nasal congestion from colds or allergies). Rub on forehead and sinuses for quick relief of headaches. In addition, Lynx Balm provides relief from the itch of insect bites and stings - simply dab a bit on the bite, then don't scratch for a bit and the itch will disappear!
Contains: Hemp seed oil, castor oil, extra virgin olive oil, menthol crystals, camphor crystals, beeswax, and peppermint, cajeput, clove, eucalyptus, and wintergreen essential oils.
Sold in a 1 oz. glass jar or 1 oz push-up tube

name: White Pine Salve
description:
White Pine, one of Maine's most prolific and beautiful trees, was highly valued by Native people for its many healing qualities. And there is no better ally than Goldenseal (also native though endangered in the wild) for healing infections.

This salve combines White Pine tips harvested in late spring, then infused in extra virgin olive oil, castor oil, goldenseal, beeswax, and pine and white camphor essential oils. It's anti-fungal, antibacterial, and antiseptic. An excellent addition to your herbal medicine cabinet - use on burns, scrapes, skin irritations, cuts, and rashes. Also useful for drawing out splinters.

Size: 1 ounce in a glass jar.
